_sText: zm_onadega Map Features: - 48 Player Spawns - Cubemaps - Radar Map - 4 Easy Secrets - 2 Medium Secrets - Barricading Spots - Climbing Spots Okay, this map is probably the smallest I've released. It's a 2-story house with a basement, garage, and tiny play house. The map is based off of my cousin's house in Onadega, Ontario. The first floor is almost 100% accurate, but the second floor has some rooms merged, and the basement is completely original, except the staircase and door to the outside. The house also has too many windows. O well, it's a game right? Anyway, the map does have a bunch of secrets like all my maps. Some are easy, a couple are hard. (Invisible buttons & stuff...) This map was made small so that when there are only a few people on a server, it doesn't take forever to find them, but when there are a lot there is a decent spot for everyone. Thanks to MoOnLiGht for testing this map on the Zombie Network II server: 81.95.0.26:27035 (Unlimited Ammo, No Reload, Prop Menu) All custom materials are paked into the map, including the radar. Let me know if you have texture missing bugs, but I don't think there will be any. Tell me what you guys think!! PS: Minor note regarding the flag and symbols on the house: My extended family is Latvian, and that's the flag of Latvia. The wooden symbol is something they'll put on their houses, but I don't know what it means or signifies, just that my cousins have one on their house, so I put it up too.
